channel.title: Question to good ppls of mopar
channel.description: Ok when u talk to npc i want it to have dialogue then after that i want it to have two options like yes or no. If u have any idea how to do this can you please help me, or give me link to tut i am good at those lol, i can code, but new to it. Thank you in advance

ah what u need help with i am confused o and thank you for this

item.title: Question to good ppls of mopar
item.dc:creator: @newbie_nub newbie nub
item.description:
@newbie_nub wrote:

hang one i have a tut in my server folder but after i give will you look at my thread and help me[br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 06:16:53 AM[/size][hr]Please find this in client.java

[code]

     case 1002:
        sendFrame171(1, 2465);
        sendFrame171(0, 2468);
        sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
        sendFrame126("Of course.", 2461);
        sendFrame126("Nope.", 2462);
        sendFrame164(2459);
        NpcDialogueSend = true;
        break;[/code]

Underneath it please add this:


	case 1055:
            sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
            sendFrame126("", 4903);
            sendFrame126("Get some holy symbols and use them on the fountain!", 4904);
            sendFrame126("Heres one free holy symbol for you :)", 4905);
            sendFrame126("", 4906);
            sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
            sendFrame164(4900);
            NpcDialogueSend = true;
            break;

Now we have added that we need to make a Chuck Speak!
Posted at: December 23, 2006, 03:57:40 AMStep 17:

Open npchandler.java and search for moo, you should see this:

[Code]

				if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
					if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
					}
				}[/code]

Underneath the last } add this:

[Code]

if (npcs[i].npcType == 29)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Want to know how to level in java?Look no further!”;
}
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2007, 06:21:22 AM[/size][hr]and btw im lord valens just he got moderated

Read full topic
